description: The Treasury Board of Canada Secretariat has a requirement for one (1) leadership development consultant at the senior level.

# Leadership Development Consultant at the Senior Level
## Solicitation Details

* Title: Leadership Development Consultant at the Senior Level
* Solicitation Number: 24062-22-546
* Amendment Number: 3
* Solicitation Date: November 17, 2022
* Tender Closing Date: December 15, 2022, 2:00 PM EST

## Bid Opportunity Overview

The Treasury Board of Canada is seeking a Leadership Development Consultant at the senior level. The estimated duration of the contract is 14 months from December 23, 2022, to March 31, 2024.

## Requirements and Conditions

The consultant will support the development of the leadership team within the Treasury Board of Canada Secretariat. The services can be delivered remotely.

## Trade Agreements

This procurement is open to suppliers from Canada, Panama, Colombia, Peru, Chile, Ukraine, and Honduras, among others, as per the listed trade agreements.

## Tender Evaluation Criteria

Proposal submissions will be evaluated based on factors including the consultant's qualifications, experience, and methodology.

## Contact Information

For more information or to submit a proposal, please contact:

Name: Robert Penwarden
Email: [robert.penwarden@tbs-sct.gc.ca](mailto:robert.penwarden@tbs-sct.gc.ca)
Phone: (343) 543-6021

## Important Documents

Please refer to the attached documents for further information:

* Notice of Proposed Procurement (in both English and French)

To access the full documentation, please visit: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/17/2f1cc9da152f9507324668b496e6958e/24062-22-546_-_notice_of_proposed_procurement_npp_-_english_version.pdf
